content: this simple baby blanket crochet pattern makes a beautiful soft budget-friendly uses only one skein crochet baby blanket and it is sure to become your go-to baby blanket crochet pattern it s an easy to follow pattern and uses only simple stitches - perfect for beginners learning how to crochet a baby blanket or to make as a baby shower gift view the pattern here https //jototheworld com/simple-baby-blanket-crochet-pattern about the pattern - this fast simple baby blanket pattern works up quickly - it creates a soft and cuddly blanket that looks beautiful on display in the nursery and of course on a baby - easy to make only requires knowledge of how to single_crochet double_crochet stitch chain and slip_stitch - the pattern is customizable so you can make the blanket any size you d like and the pattern includes instructions on how to adjust to size
